long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect, organize, and collaborate on the things you want to do.

The Wribbn button lets you plan for the things you want to do by letting you save the exact things you need - places, products, links, and text – in organized and actionable lists.

Plan with Wribbn, whether it’s furnishing a new place, going camping, cooking a new recipe, or simply bookmarking information as you browse the internet.

The Wribbn button also gives you access to all of your Wribbn lists so you can recall saved items quickly.

Have plans with friends? The Wribbn button lets you chat with friends you’re collaborating with as you’re planning and browsing online.
